body: Lmao guys this dude literally looks like  fucking Kazuichi Souda from danganronpa. Before he entered Hope's Peak Academy he used to have normal hair along with sharp teeth with braces on them and glasses but he got rid of them and later he grew his hair, dyed them pink and got rid off his glasses lmao so that he could fit in with people and have that "tough punk" look and attitude after he got trust issues from his best friend who blamed him for willingly giving him the test answers for cheating.
Gotta love the transformers fan at the end.

I mean I didn't mind it.But the weird rapey vibes and weird teeth didn't really sit well with me. And also the whole somewhat cucky feeling from the fact that she is very obviously in love with her brother and hints that she still is at the end just kinda ruins the vanilla esque beginning. ( Im not too bothered by incest but i think it would have been a better story if the brother came instead of having this weird teeth dude). However i will say the female characters design and the artwork is amazing and somewhat makes up for the shitty story.

What a shame. This could have easily been a masterpiece with a better story. She's so damn hot and cute in that dress! But this nonsensical story really ruins it. And wtf are these teeth? At least it was consensual.. I guess.
Translators' notes are on point. The artist did an amazing job on the main gal's character design but everything else is pretty shit.
Those TEETH shocked me... What's with the artist and his attachment to sharp teeth
If I am her elder brother, I will kill that boy.
I'm actually kinda bothered by this relationship lol.
thought is was rape, but that plot twist
The hentai logic is strong with this one.  How that guy got it on with the girl is ridiculous, but I guess it doesn't matter had sex
